analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Pairs in Direct-Order

original: Narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na rūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  nana rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca nana rūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a fine-material-sphere state as condition, a fine-material-sphere state arises, a root-cause condition … three.🔽With an immaterial-sphere state as condition, an immaterial-sphere state … three.

original: Narūpāvacarañca nanarūpāvacarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na rūpāvacaram ca na na rūpāvacaram ca dhammam paṭicca na rūpāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a fine-material-sphere and an immaterial-sphere state as condition, an immaterial-sphere state … three. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava
translated: Nine by root-cause condition, four by object condition, five by predominance condition … six by proximity condition … two by contiguity condition … six by presence condition … six by non-disappearance condition.
